text: Pavetta lasioclada is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Ghana, Guinea, Mali, Sierra Leone, and Togo. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Hawthorne, W. 1998. Pavetta lasioclada. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==External links== lasioclada Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pavetta lasioclada
